about_the_game: The demo lets you play in the same instance of Blêktreville as all other players, but your character will only have a limited-duration residency permit. Once this permit expires, your character will become illegal and may be hunted by player police officers.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains light and humorous depictions of activities such as drug trafficking, prostitution, the meat industry, banking, police repression.
